desc.p: Defines the interest rate at which penalty interest is calculated for the PD contract.
Each time the SCHEDULE operation is used to make a rate change, then the new rate is written to this field.
This field is part of an associated multivalue set.
Up to 11 numeric type R characters plus a decimal point. (Associated multivalue field).
Defines the interest spread rate at which penalty interest is calculated for the PD contract.
Each time the SCHEDULE operation is used to make a spread change, then the new rate is written to this field.
This field is part of an associated multivalue set.
Up to 11 numeric type R characters plus a decimal point. (Associated multivalue field).
A unique reference number which identifies a particular Payment Due Rates record.
This Id is the same as the Id of the underlying Payment Due contract.

10 numeric characters prefixed by "PDXX", where XX is the application for which the PD record has been raised, e.g. LD, MM or MG. The XX may be PD if the PD record was raised through the PD.CAPTURE application without an underlying loan being present.
Identifies any local reference field(s) defined by the user.
Identifies any additional element which has been defined locally to meet a particular requirement.
Up to 35 characters as defined in the local table definition for this local reference field. (Multivalue field).
Optional or mandatory input according to the LOCAL.TABLE definition for this field.
Defines the date on which the associated interest rate or spread became effective.
This field is part of an associated multivalue set.
The multivalues are in date order with the latest rates in the first multivalue set.
11 type D characters - standard date format. (Associated multivalue field).
